attributes.action: Direct the inclusion of extra sound channels in digital television such that unwanted background "music" can be muted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many television documentaries are 
broadcast with modern music that 
distracts and annoys many viewers. 
They would be much more enjoyable if 
the viewer could exclude the 
unwanted sounds. Even Police chase 
documentaries are included here. 
Or sports shows without 
commentary. Let people have choice!
